<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>MERLI</catalog>

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/1090</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/1090</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Marca el prefijo</string>
            <string language="en">Dial the prefix</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wählen Sie das Vorzeichen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Composez le préfixe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Marque o prefixo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Componga il prefisso</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχηματίστε το πρόθεμα</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica (MUD) que estudia els lexemes, prefixos i sufixos en llengua castellana. Es presenten expressions escrites juntes o separades amb textos orals i escrits. L'alumnat disposa de seccions per avaluar-se, practicar, imprimir o sol·licitar més ajut.</string>
            <string language="en">Mini teaching unit (MUD) on lexemes, prefixes and suffixes in Spanish. Viewers are given expressions put together or separately in oral and written texts. The unit includes sections for self-assessment, practice, printing and asking for further help.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">exercici</string>
            <string language="en">exercise</string>
            <string language="es">ejercicio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">gramàtica</string>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
            <string language="es">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">material interactiu</string>
            <string language="en">interactive material</string>
            <string language="es">material interactivo</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit (SCHLAMM) auf 
Lexemen, Vorzeichen und Suffixen auf spanisch. Projektoren 
werden Ausdrücke die zusammen oder separat eingesetzt in die Mund- 
und schriftlichen Texte gegeben. Die Maßeinheit schließt 
Kapitel für Selbstbewertung, die Praxis ein und druckt und bittet um 
weitere Hilfe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement (BOUE) sur des 
lexèmes, des préfixes et des suffixes dans l'Espagnol. Des 
visualisateurs sont donnés des expressions mises ensemble ou 
séparément en textes oraux et écrits. L'unité inclut des 
sections pour art de l'auto-portrait-assessment, pratique, imprimant et demandant 
davantage d'aide.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini (LAMA) em lexemes, em 
prefixos e em sufixos no espanhol. Os visores são dados as 
expressões postas junto ou separada em textos orais e escritos. 
A unidade inclui seções para o self-assessment, prática, 
imprimindo e pedindo ajuda mais adicional.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mini unità d'istruzione (FANGO) sui lessemi, sui 
prefissi e sui suffissi nello Spagnolo. I visori sono dati le 
espressioni messe insieme o esclusivamente in testi orali e scritti. 
L'unità include le sezioni per la valutazione di se stesso, 
pratica, stampante e chiedente ulteriore aiuto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) στα lexemes, τα 
προθέματα και τα επιθήματα στα ισπανικά. Στις εμφανίσεις 
δίνονται οι εκφράσεις συνολικά ή χωριστά στα προφορικά και 
γραπτά κείμενα. Η μονάδα περιλαμβάνει τα τμήματα της 
αυτοαξιολόγησης, της πρακτικής, της εκτύπωσης και της ζήτησης τις 
περαιτέρω οδηγίες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grammatik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">interaktives Material</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">exercice</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">grammaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">matériel interactif</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">exercício</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">material interativo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">esercitazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">grammatica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">materiale interattivo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">άσκηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραμματική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διαλογικό υλικό</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
